typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		fruit as string,
		size as string,
		color as string,
		firstName as string,
		lastName as string,
		gender as string,
		age as string,
		address as (streetAddress as string, city as string, state as string),
		phoneNumbers as (type as string, number as string)[],
		value as string,
		people as (firstName as string, lastName as string, gender as string, age as string, number as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:['sample1.json']) ~> source2
source2 filter(fruit=="Apple") ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		fruit as string,
		size as string,
		color as string,
		firstName as string,
		lastName as string,
		gender as string,
		age as string,
		address as (streetAddress as string, city as string, state as string),
		phoneNumbers as (type as string, number as string)[],
		value as string,
		people as (firstName as string, lastName as string, gender as string, age as string, number as string)[]
	),
	filePattern:'TEST_DF01.Json',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
